name: node.js for Raspberry PI
tagline: A compiled version of nodejs for the Raspberry Pi 2
body: ### Welcome to node.js for Raspberry Pi 2 site. You've received your incredible Raspberry 2 and your fan of javascript devlopment, but don't want loose time compiling node.js sources for your device. This site is for you, juste copy, paste this command line and replace the appropriate version and it'll install node.js on your Pi2 curl http://nodepi.github.io/nodejs_pi2/node_0.12.1.sh | sh ### Authors and Contributors nodepi(@nodepi) - 2015
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
